To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private AbandonedBaby _abandonedbaby;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_abandonedbaby = AbandonedBaby(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_abandonedbaby.IsReady)
{
    var current = _abandonedbaby.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.abandonedbaby = self.AbandonedBaby(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.abandonedbaby.IsReady:
    current = self.abandonedbaby.Current.Value
